---
title: "R Notebook"
output: html_notebook
---



Syntax            | Condition
------------------|----------------------------------------
==                |  Equality test
!=                |  Different than
%in%  c(...)      |  Is in this list of values
$>, >=$   $<, <=$ |  Greater/less than 
! (x %in% c(...)) |  Not in the list
&                 | And
\|                | Or
